entries.femaleVariant: James Weiss, FIA. I guess you're V, is that right?
[Enter] Lil' nervous, not gonna lie.
Lozano, pleasure. I'll be among those operating on you.
Let's start with a quick nervous system scan. You mind givin' me your personal link?
[Jack in] How's it lookin'?
Hm. I'd say the prognosis is good. Neural network degradation looks reversible.
There it is. Night City – at your feet.
Ah, good ol' Night City. Most reliable of late capitalism's human meat grinders.
Survived it once, do well to remember that if you're ever tossed back in again…
Don't worry. You'll be back here in no time.
You shook my hand, Weiss. Indulge me?
Yeah, that's right.
If I may…
It's an honor to meet the woman who rescued the President of the NUSA.
entries.maleVariant: It's an honor to meet the man who rescued the President of the NUSA.

entries.femaleVariant: [Shake hands] Thank you.
Come on inside. Doc Lozano'll evaluate your condition, make sure you're stable.
An agency clinic in Langley. Got our best specialists stationed there.
Where's Reed? Didn't make the trip with you?
Where we goin'?
Right, thanks.
[Shake hands] Everyone gonna know I saved Myers?
He got held up, on assignment.
So, how's it lookin', Doc?
Was it always that small, or did you just get too big for it?
Been a long road.
Was only fighting for survival…
Don't gotta pretend everything's OK.
Was a long road, but I fuckin' made it.
Was just fightin' to survive. Nothin' more.
Really, Johnny… Don't need to do this.
'S OK, V. You're allowed to be a little proud of yourself.
Fought long, fought hard, V. You deserve this.
So was I, 'cept your fight made all the difference.
Don't deserve to have you by my side…
When has telling me what to do ever worked, huh?
You 'n' me - we're good?
Hoped for a different ending, didn't ya.
'S not OK.
So you sayin' you 'n' me… we're good?
Made our peace at the oil fields. Nothing's changed since then.
So... no hard feelin's? Know this ain't the outcome you hoped for.
Hoped for a lotta things in my time. And people I cared about got hurt. Don't need that happenin' again.
Drop the charade, Johnny. This ain't no happy ending. Stop pretending it's all peachy.
Mind's made up – gonna stick with you these last moments. Allow me that much.
Just glad you'll pull through. And that I got the chance to call you my friend.
Fine, have it your way.
Thing is, 'm I bein' a true friend?
Johnny, I'm killing you.
All right, have it your way.
First thing you'll do once they discharge you – go.
Drink to my comrade in arms.
Damn right you will.
Can't help wonderin' if I can still call myself your friend.
'Course you can. Got my blessing.
Been in your head some time, V. Know you well enough that it ain't even a question.
This isn't OK, Johnny. I'm basically killing you.
C'mon, we knew it'd end this way. Was either you or me. When all's said and done – it's your body.
I... don't want you to die.
'S OK, I know. Better this way, though.
Wonder what things'd be like if we'd never met.
So damn calm about this. How do you do it?
Wonder how things would've turned out if we'd never met.
First, bullet to the brain would've ended you on the spot. Second, woulda never survived the rest 'thout my expert advice.
I wanted to crack a lame joke, put up some saccharin-sweet lie, but looks like you beat me to it.
Think I understand. My first near-death experience scared me shitless.
Understand the feeling.
You not afraid of death?
The nothingness is… frightening.
But fear's like a well. More you draw, drink from it, the less is left.
You genuinely not afraid of death?
Was the one feelin' I couldn't shake the last few weeks. No matter what I did.
Sayin' that to comfort me. But I know the feelin' of dyin'. Moment right before the blackout.
It's frightening. Cold 'n'… numbin', the nothingness. Worst imaginable feeling.
Scares me I can't stick around, see what happens – to you, the world.
But honestly? Thought of you gone so I could live always scared me more.
Think this is it, kiddo.
Guess... so.
Promise me one thing, will ya?
Anything.
Got no choice, do I?
Have to be a true jackass to say no now.
I promise. No idea what, but I promise.
Not askin' you to never give up. Sometimes you gotta let go...
Just don't let anyone change who you are, 'kay?
Johnny... I...
G'night, Valerie. Today was a good day.
entries.maleVariant: G'night, Vincent. Today was a good day.

entries.femaleVariant: Won't remember you.
Doesn't feel like I lost.
Learned a lot, at least.
Think I'll wanna remember anything you've said? That's adorable.
What you want's got nothin' to do with it. Your conscience'll catch up.
And what exactly should I feel guilty about again...?
V, ya crapped out.
Congrats. Can feel proud o' what you've become.
Don't feel like I lost, though.
Shame. Maybe you oughta.
Why? 'Cause I finally got what I fought tooth 'n' nail for?
'M sure I'll handle it. Slipped-up occasionally, but learned a buttload over the last few weeks.
Interesting. 'Cause I see someone who's come all this way 'thout learnin' shit.
You're a narcissist. Always have been, always will be.
What do you want from me, Johnny?!
Don't deserve this ribbing.
If it was your call, wouldn't think twice about havin' me killed.
How the fuck would you know? Never bothered tryin' to understand who I am, what I'm about.
Understand you well enough. You're a fuckin' narcissist.
Look who's talkin'. Go ahead, pin the blame on me – keep that conscience clean an' sparkly.
Let it go. Don't deserve this abuse.
People rarely get what they deserve, V.
Why, Johnny? Last time we're ever gonna talk, this, so you're gonna do your damndest to make me feel like shit?
'Cause it's my last chance to make a difference. If not in the world, then in you.
What the hell you want from me, Johnny?
Acknowledgement. Decency. A sprinkling of regret and an apology.
Want an apology for me choosin' to save my own life?
No, V. An apology for fuckin' ending mine.
Got no right to lecture me.
Really wanna fight now?
I just wanna live!
Spent your whole life livin' on a whim, lookin' out for your ass and your ass alone.
Got no right to lecture me, Silverhand.
You want me to act like this, us, was just a big nothingburger. An' we'll just drift off into sweet slumber.
Except only one of us is wakin' up.
Even now, all you can think is to bicker?
Is it so damn hard to say "Look, V, didn't see eye-to-eye 'n' everything, but least it was nice knowin' you"?
Just wanna live, Johnny. Been clear about that from the start.
There were options. Could've gone with Alt, blasted our way into Mikoshi…
But I didn't. Can't fault for me picking the safer route.
Getting your just desserts, Johnny.
Sorry it had to end this way.
You deserve it. Goin' out like this.
I'm sorry, Johnny. Sorry you couldn't go on your terms, the way you wanted.
Shouldn't be like this, I know.
How the fuck so? Enlighten me.
You're just spewin' words.
Fine, yeah, but I wanted you to hear 'em.
Could've been solid-ass chooms in another life.
For starters, you're a narcissist and sociopath.
Only way you can live with yourself is by believin' you never do anything wrong, pinnin' the blame for your mistakes on others.
Know the worst part, though?
Nah, but guessin' you do.
Your arrogance killed you.
You're no hero.
Actually could've been the "fuck the system", gung-ho, rebel king you so like to think you were…
But you self-destructed. I didn't kill you, nor did Arasaka. Your sheer, fucking arrogance did, Johnny.
Always were your worst enemy. You, your hubris.
Prolly think yourself a revolutionary, a fuckin' hero.
Hate to break it to ya… You're just a sad excuse for a man who thinks the world's gotta suffer along with him.
That's your legacy, Johnny. Remember that as you go.
We were too different.
We were too alike.
Think we were just too different. And we refused to put in the time to understand each other.
Fuckin' unbearable… bein' stuck inside someone with different values.
Never occurred to me you're entitled to your own. Like everyone.
We were too much alike. Stubborn to a fault, iron-willed.
Glued to our principles, you an' I...
Good to hear.
No tellin' what we'd've achieved if we'd really put our heads together. No pun intended.
Think we can find it in our heart to forgive each other?
Yes.
No.
Yeah... I can. You?
Think I can too.
No. But that's OK too.
You're right. Fairer this way, for us both.
You done?
I'm done.
Never wanna see you again.
'Bout sums it up, yeah. Said my piece.
Really, really hope I'll never see you again.
Made mistakes, I admit it. We all do.
But if you think I wanted to be a hero, then you don't know jack-shit about me.
Kinda nervous, not gonna lie…
Expectin' nothin' but the NUS's finest, Mr. Weiss.
[Enter] I know about Langley.
Wouldn't mind sayin' goodbye to Night City.
Wanna bid the city goodbye. Mind openin' the door?
Figurin' out somethin' that might work versus a surgical procedure. Choice is clear, Johnny.
entries.maleVariant: Figurin' out somethin' that might work... versus a surgical procedure. Choice is clear, Johnny.

entries.femaleVariant: Raisin' Reed on the holo.
So this is how it ends…
Sorry, Johnny, I am. Just… FIA's powerful, gives me the best chance.
We gonna argue about this again? Can we please not?
I get it, I do. Your choice to make, not mine.
Got my pride, V. Not about to beg for my life.
So, hang on – everybody know about me and Myers? What about plausible deniability, buryin' shit, whatnot?
Officially, nothin' happened. But water cooler talk goes deep within the FIA. Word spreads.
[Enter] Good hands – gonna hold you to that.
Good hands – gonna hold you to that.
And thus a new life begins...
Can never be too sure. Just open it?
Yet another new lease on life…
Mind openin' the door? Wanna enjoy the view.
Wonderin' why we weren't in this one.
Think that's what I respect most about you. Stickin' to your guns.
Here I was, thinkin' I'd land a cheesy one-liner…
You think you're jokin', but it's actually true.
Truth is, I don't know, V. Maybe you'd've lived a quiet, normal life... or gotten shivved in a jail cell.
But sweet lady fate brought us together an' put us through some shit. 'S what counts.
Know you're kiddin', but it's actually true. You saved me.
Relic was your life support, but what saved you was courage, the will to survive.
Us meetin' – coincidence. Shit we went through together, though? That's what counts.
How're you doin' this? Bein' so damn... calm about it?
Died once already, y'know. Gettin' used to it.
Jokes aside, though...
Honestly, always felt death breathin' down my neck... 'S why I lived like every day was my last.
But now, first time in fucking forever, I feel at peace.
Was thinkin'... wanna get one last look at Night City, that beautiful, old bitch…?
Whaddaya say?
I've got readings spiking – strong emotions.
Let's do this… We want your brain burden-free, never know how stress might affect it.
Shall we?
V?
Sit, please?
Patient stable, pressure normal.
Let's dive in, folks.
Hope there's enough of those tatters left to scan…
The damage is apparent but… looks fixable.
[Jack in] Enough of my tattered nerves left to scan?
Fuck am I sorry.
Gonna argue again?
Gotta be livid with me…
Gotta be livid with me…
Nah, forget about it. Been in it for you to succeed for a while, now…
Just need… a moment to think.
My body, Johnny, plain as that.
How else d'you see it playin' out? It's my body.
Mh, and it's my life.
[Wait for AV]
Where ya takin' me?
Not to worry, you're in good hands.
You're right. Can't go through with it.
[Call Reed] I've decided, Johnny.
Shit, agreed. Can't do it, wouldn't be right.
Fuck the FIA.
Hah. Good to be seein' eye to eye again.
Thanks, V, truly.
You serious? Wham-bam and no dice?
Wham-bam and no dice.
Hm. Fuckin' shockin' turn of events.
I-- thanks, V. Just thanks.
Say you told the FIA to stick their offer where the sun don't shine?
Just… don't make the call to Reed. We'll find another way.
Do what, now?
Message – didn't see it? They wanna wipe me. Need me to explain the ins and outs?
Shit was clear as day from the start.
Didn't put it all together till now.
C'mon, I was gonna fight to the end, you knew that.
Shit was clear as the summer sky already. D'ya think they'd suck you outta one head, drop you in another?
Well, thought I'd get packed and shelved. And in the best of all possible worlds, that you'd help me hop on the Net.
Not that they'd excise me. Like some fuckin' tumor.
Tsk, yeah. It's just… I didn't put the facts together till now.
Mh. Convenient. But say I go along with that.
Question is, what're you gonna do with the facts?
C'mon, you knew I'd fight for my life to the end, no matter the price. As obvious to you as it was to me.
Call me a chump, but I never thought I'd be that price.
C'mon, V. Don't make the call.
Thanks much.
